help.short: Name of the L3 Isolation Domain.

help.short: Name of the L3 Isolation Domain.

command.name: create

help.short: Name of the L3 Isolation Domain.

command.argGroup:
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.optionAProperties.nativeIpv4PrefixLimit.prefixLimits" options="prefix-limits">
<arg type="array<@PrefixLimitProperties_create>" var="$resource.properties.optionAProperties.nativeIpv6PrefixLimit.prefixLimits" options="prefix-limits">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.optionBProperties.exportRouteTargets" options="export-route-targets">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.optionBProperties.importRouteTargets" options="import-route-targets">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.optionBProperties.routeTargets.exportIpv4RouteTargets" options="export-ipv4-route-targets">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.optionBProperties.routeTargets.exportIpv6RouteTargets" options="export-ipv6-route-targets">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.optionBProperties.routeTargets.importIpv4RouteTargets" options="import-ipv4-route-targets">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.optionBProperties.routeTargets.importIpv6RouteTargets" options="import-ipv6-route-targets">
<arg type="array" var="$resource.properties.staticRouteConfiguration.ipv4Routes" options="ipv4-routes">
<arg type="array" var="@StaticRouteProperties_create.nextHop" options="next-hop" required="True">
<arg type="array<@StaticRouteProperties_create>" var="$resource.properties.staticRouteConfiguration.ipv6Routes" options="ipv6-routes">

json.schema:

command.name: update
